rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg001
rows.name:
What do you think of this palace?
It's just as impressive as Superbia's,
isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg002
rows.name:
Hmph. Bold words from someone
who abandoned his country.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg003
rows.name: That's a harsh comeback.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg004
rows.name:
So you still have no plans
to return to your homeland?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg005
rows.name: ...It's complicated.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg006
rows.name: Is something holding you back?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg007
rows.name:
Tell me, Meleph,
do you care deeply about your country?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg008
rows.name: Where did that come from all of a sudden?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg009
rows.name:
Just humor me and answer.
Would you put protecting your country
above everything else?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg021
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg022
rows.name: Of course.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg023
rows.name: Is it different for you?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg101
rows.name: Why do you ask such a thing?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg102
rows.name:
Well... of course as a prince
it's expected that I'd protect
my country and people.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg103
rows.name: But is that really sufficient?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg104
rows.name: What are you getting at?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg105
rows.name:
This world is already at its limit
You've seen various places, so you
understand, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg107
rows.name:
My old man shut our country off
from the outside world to protect
our nation and people.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg108
rows.name:
But that was just averting his
eyes from reality and running away.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg109
rows.name:
Even if you can temporarily protect the
country and its people, if the world
eventually perishes, it's all over.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg110
rows.name:
I simply couldn't agree
with my father's thinking.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg111
rows.name: Is that why you left your homeland?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg112
rows.name:
That's right. If there was even
the smallest chance I could help
save the world...

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg120
rows.name:
I figured I could hel
people who were suffering.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg113
rows.name:
I guess it was just youthful
idealism.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg114
rows.name:
Reality was cruel.
I was forced to confront just how
powerless I really was.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg115
rows.name:
But you haven't abandoned
your dream of saving the world,
have you?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg116
rows.name:
Naturally.
If I'm not strong enough yet,
I'll just have to get stronger.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg117
rows.name:
If I can't do it by myself,
I'll just have to find more comrades.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg118
rows.name:
Meleph, I'll be borrowing your
strength too. I'm counting on you.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg119
rows.name: ... Let's do our best.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg217
rows.name:
Wanting to protect one's country is only
natural. It's our responsibility,
isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg201
rows.name: That's it! My father said the same thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg202
rows.name: But is that really sufficient?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg203
rows.name: What are you getting at?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg204
rows.name:
This world has reached its limit.
At this rate, it will eventually perish.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg205
rows.name:
My old man chose to ignore what
was happening in the wider world and
focus solely on protecting our country.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg206
rows.name:
A king's first duty is to protect his
nation. I don't think I can blame him
for the choice he made.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg207
rows.name:
But is it really acceptable to only care
about your own country's welfare?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg208
rows.name:
Is it really happiness to exist
in isolation, ignorant of
the outside world?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg209
rows.name:
No matter what you do,
if the world ends, your country will
disappear along with it.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg210
rows.name: I can't stand that.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg211
rows.name:
Sitting doing nothing as the whole
shebang falls down... That's no way
for anyone to live.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg218
rows.name:
I absolutely refusen
to give up on the future.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg212
rows.name:
That's why I left this country.
Until I protect this world, I have 
no intention of returning to my country.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg213
rows.name: Heh... You're a straightforward man.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg219
rows.name:
But I must admit,
I envy your ability to express
yourself so openly, Zeke.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg214
rows.name: Hey, what are you saying?

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg220
rows.name:
You should just be yourself too!
It's not like you need to hold back
for anyone's sake.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg215
rows.name: ...Heh.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg221
rows.name:
But having too many straightforward
people like Rex and Zeke might mean
overlooking important details.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg216
rows.name:
Really, you're a troublesome guy.
But I'm counting on you from now on.

rows.label: kizunatalk042_msg222
rows.name: Yeah, leave it to me.
